alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 2:16PM CST until March 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST SATURDAY TO 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Lake County. * WHEN...From noon CST Saturday to 1 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
